summary.pricing_justification: The pricing is competitive within the premium segment of motorcycle accessories, acknowledging the high value of BMW Motorrad brands.
summary.market_assumptions: The market is growing with a trend towards personalized and bundled accessory packages.
summary.growth_projections_reasoning: Growth is based on historical data trends and increasing brand loyalty.
summary.churn_rate_assumptions: Initial lower churn rates are expected due to high brand loyalty, increasing slightly as the market matures.
summary.customer_lifetime_value: Customer lifetime value is enhanced by bundling, which increases the average transaction size and customer retention.

comparable_projects.name: Ducati Performance Accessories
comparable_projects.description: Ducati offers a subscription model for performance and aesthetic accessories, focusing on integrated packages for ease of dealer and customer use.
comparable_projects.subscription_model: Monthly subscription with tiered pricing based on accessory type and bundle size.

comparable_projects.name: Harley-Davidson Genuine Motor Parts
comparable_projects.description: Harley-Davidson provides subscription services for genuine motor parts and accessories tailored to enhance motorcycle performance and aesthetics.
comparable_projects.subscription_model: Annual subscription with discounts for long-term commitments.

methodology.data_sources: Industry reports, market analysis from automotive accessory publications, BMW historical sales data.
methodology.assumptions: Steady growth in brand loyalty, willingness to pay a premium for bundled accessories, low initial churn due to brand prestige.
